title: Weather Forecast
transcript: Good morning, this is your local weather report. Today will be mostly sunny with temperatures reaching twenty-two degrees Celsius. There will be light winds from the east at fifteen kilometers per hour. Tonight, expect clear skies with temperatures dropping to eight degrees. Tomorrow, clouds will increase during the morning, and we expect light rain to begin around 2 PM. The rain will continue through the evening with temperatures staying around sixteen degrees.
